data.title: B Long to B Site Trailblazer
data.description: A good Trailblazer to clear the common corners on your way into B Site.

data.title: A Main to U Hall Trailblazer
data.description: A good Trailblazer to clear most of the common corners on your way into A Site.

data.title: B Short To B Hookah Guiding Light
data.description: This is useful for blinding players in B Hookah from B Short.

data.title: A Lamps To Back A Site Guiding Light
data.description: This is useful for blinding players in the back of A Site and players pushing in to retake from Defender Side Spawn.
